meanings.definition: A subclass of marine cephalopods characterized by a coiled external shell.
meanings.sent1: The nautiloids in the ocean have beautiful shells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of nautiloids to learn about ancient sea creatures.
meanings.sent3: The nautiloids had a shell party under the sea.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like nautiloids, spiraling endlessly in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The nautiloids' shells gleamed in the sunlight, mesmerizing all who saw them.

meanings.definition: Any member of the subclass Nautiloidea, including living and extinct species.
meanings.sent1: I read about different types of nautiloids in my marine biology book.
meanings.sent2: Nautiloids are fascinating creatures that have survived for millions of years.
meanings.sent3: The nautiloids threw a birthday party for the oldest member of their group.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as ancient and enduring as the nautiloids in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The nautiloids gracefully swam through the water, a sight to behold for any observer.
